<span style="color:#2878B3;font-size:90%;font-weight:normal;">ReLTER</span> provides access to [DEIMS-SDR](https://deims.org/), and allows interaction with data and software implemented by [Long Term Ecological Research Research Infrastructure (eLTER-RI)](https://elter-ri.eu) thus improving data sharing among [European LTER projects](https://elter-ri.eu/projects).

# Documentation of <span style="color:#2878B3;font-size:90%;font-weight:normal;">ReLTER</span>

Visit the <span style="color:#2878B3;font-size:90%;font-weight:normal;">ReLTER</span> [website](https://oggioniale.github.io/ReLTER/) for further documentation, examples, and installation of the package.

# Installation of <span style="color:#2878B3;font-size:90%;font-weight:normal;">ReLTER</span>

You can install the development version of <span style="color:#2878B3;font-size:90%;font-weight:normal;">ReLTER</span> from [GitHub](https://github.com/oggioniale/ReLTER) with:

```{r, installationInfo, eval = FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("oggioniale/ReLTER")
```
If you wish to help develop this package, please follow the [contributing guidelines](https://oggioniale.github.io/ReLTER/CONTRIBUTING.html).

# Citation of <span style="color:#2878B3;font-size:90%;font-weight:normal;">ReLTER</span>

To cite <span style="color:#2878B3;font-size:90%;font-weight:normal;">ReLTER</span> please use:
Alessandro Oggioni, Micha Silver, Luigi Ranghetti & Paolo Tagliolato. (2021). oggioniale/ReLTER: ReLTER v1.0.0 (1.0.0). Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5576813

or:

``` bibtex
@software{alessandro_oggioni_2021_5576813,
  author       = {Alessandro Oggioni and Micha Silver and Luigi Ranghetti and Paolo Tagliolato},

  month        = nov,
  year         = 2021,
  publisher    = {Zenodo},
  version      = {1.0.0},
  doi          = {10.5281/zenodo.5576813},
```
